mapper.select: select ticker , h_date as 'date' , open_price as 'openPrice' , high_price as 'highPrice' , low_price as 'lowPrice' , close_price as 'closePrice' , h_change as 'change' from history where ticker = #{value} order by h_date

select b_date as 'date' , ticker , weight , best_length as 'bestLength' , best_percent as 'bestPercent' , average_by_plus as 'averageByPlus' , average_by_minus as 'averageByMinus' from buy_ticker where seq = #{num} order by b_date
